select count(*) from coupon where mno = #{memNo}

SELECT coupon.cno , coupon.mno , CNAME , DISCOUNT , to_char(coupon.dedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "dedate" , to_char(coupon.endate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "endate" FROM COUPONLIST JOIN COUPON ON (COUPON.CNO = COUPONLIST.CNO) WHERE MNO = #{memNo}

select qno , category , q_title , q_content , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , a_content , a_date from qna where mno = #{memNo} order by qno desc
select count(*) from qna where mno = #{memNo} and round(sysdate - create_date) <= 7

select clno , l.mno as "mno" , cl_name , cl_price , to_char(cl_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "cl_date" , cl_img from class c join like_item l on (c.clno = l.refer_no) where l.mno = #{mno}

select class_review.clno as "clno" , class_review.mno as "mno" , class.cl_name , content , star , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , cl_img from class_review join class on (class_review.clno = class.clno) where class_review.mno = #{mno}
